titleStmt.title: Prince Henries obsequies or Mournefull elegies vpon his death vvith a supposed inter-locution betweene the ghost of Prince Henrie and Great Brittaine. By George Wyther.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ed: Allde, for Arthur Iohnson, at the white Horse neere vnto the great north doore of Saint Paul,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Title page cropped at foot; imprint partly in facsimile.

place.placeName: the white Horse neere vnto the great north doore of Saint Paul
